sourcesContent:
const leadershipExperience = [
    {
        place:"Computer Science Undergraduate Council",
        position:"President",
        combinedPosition:"CSUG President", //This is not entirely necessary
        date:"May 2020 - May 2021",
        description:"CSUG is one of the biggest clubs at UoR. As president, I led an e-board which focused on supporting and promoting the academic and professional career of our members. The e-board organized networking events, information sessions and hackathons. We created open-source projects to promote open-source development among our members. These projects would also be a crowd sourced resource for our members.",
    },
    {
        place:"DandyHacks (Hackathon)",
        position:"Director",
        combinedPosition:"DandyHacks Director", //This is not entirely necessary
        date:"March 2018 - October 2019",
        description:"DandyHacks is the biggest hackathon at the University of Rochester. As director, I first shifted the event to the Fall when students can get more intership offers. Secondly, I started having dedicated organizing teams. With this team, we organized two of the biggest 36 hour hackathons with 250 participants each. We raised an amount of around $14,000 for each event.",
    },
    {
        place:"Computer Science Undergraduate Council",
        position:"Tutoring Chair",
        combinedPosition:"CSUG Tutoring Chair", //This is not entirely necessary
        date:"August 2019 - May 2020",
        description:"CSUG provides a tutoring service for students taking CS courses. As the tutoring chair, I was in-charge of selecting these tutors, setting up the schedule for the semester and making sure everything ran smoothly.",
    },
    {
        place:"Google Developer Student Club At UoR",
        position:"Event Planning Chair",
        combinedPosition:"Google DSC at UoR Event Planning Chair", //This is not entirely necessary
        date:"December 2019 - May 2020",
        description:"DSC is a club that promotes the learning of technlogies such as GCP, Flutter and so on. As event planning chair, I organized and led study sessions, workshops on these technologies. I also participated in solution challenge which tries to solve a real world problem using technology.",
    }
]

export default leadershipExperience
